name: Putrid Haunt
resist: bludgeoning and piercing from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Dead Still
text: Treat a putrid haunt as invisible while it's buried in swamp muck.

trait.name: Swamp Shamble
text: Putrid haunts suffer no movement penalties in marshy terrain.

action.name: Slam
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Vomit Leeches (Recharge 6)
text: A putrid haunt can vomit forth the contents of its stomach onto a target within 5 feet. Along with the bile and mud from its stomach, this includes 2d6 undead leeches that attach to the target. A creature takes 1 necrotic damage per leech on it at the start of the creature's turn, and the putrid haunt gains the same number of temporary hit points. As an action, a creature can remove or destroy 1d3 leeches from itself or an adjacent ally.
